About

I am a Ph.D. student in the School of Electrical and Computer Engineering (ECE) at Purdue University, working with Prof. Mung Chiang and Prof. Kwang Taik Kim. My research interest is at the intersection of machine learning and wireless communication networks and systems. Specifically, I focus on machine learning in the realms of wireless system design for 5G and future 6G networks.

Before joining Purdue, I received the B.S. and M.S. degrees in Computer Science (CS) from National Chiao Tung University (NCTU) and National Taiwan University (NTU) in 2015 and 2017, respectively. Regarding my industrial background, I am a senior software engineer with 4 years of experience related to DevOps, software system automation (Python), and cloud application development (AWS).

Experience

  • Full-stack Cloud Developer
    IoT Eye Inc.  /  Apr. 2021 - Aug. 2021
  • Independent Researcher

    Silicon Motion Technology Corp.  /  Dec. 2017 - Apr. 2021
  • Graduate Researcher
    Ministry of Science and Technology  /  Sep. 2015 - Sep. 2017
  • Research Intern
    EDGE Lab, Princeton University  /  Jul. 2014 - Sep. 2014

Publications

  • S. B. Weinstein, Y.-Y. Lou, T. R. Hsing. Intelligent Network Edge with Distributed SDN for the Future 6G Network. IEEE International Conference on Microwaves, Communications, Antennas, Biomedical Engineering and Electronic Systems (IEEE COMCAS), 2021 (submitted)
  • Y.-Y. Shih, A.-C. Pang, Y.-Y. Lou. Development of Wearable Services with Edge Devices. Fog and Fogo-nomics: Challenges and Practices of Fog Computing, Communication, Networking, Strategy, and Economics, NJ: John Wiley & Sons, Inc., 2020, ch.13, pp. 325–352
  • Y.-Y. Shih, A.-C. Pang, Y.-Y. Lou, C.-C. Chuang, L. Zhao, Z. Ren. Modularized Service Provisioning at Fog Networks. IEEE Vehicular Technology Society Asia Pacific Wireless Communications Symposium (IEEE VTS APWCS), 2018
  • H.-P. Lin, Y.-Y. Shih, A.-C. Pang, Y.-Y. Lou. A Virtual Local-hub Solution with Function Module Sharing for Wearable Devices. ACM International Conference on Modeling, Analysis and Simulation of Wireless and Mobile Systems (ACM MSWiM), 2016
  • X.-L. Wang, M.-J. Sheng, Y.-Y. Lou, M. Chiang. Internet of Things Session Management Over LTE — Balancing Signal Load, Power, and Delay. IEEE Internet of Things Journal (IEEE IoT-J), vol. 3, no. 3, pp. 339–353, 2015
